text: 12.7: Hos 6.6; Mt 9.13Nde maaŋ muuŋgip, tuituigip Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar ana buni vhuuiŋ nɨɨŋge kaŋgirga, nde tuituigip mba bigi kaŋgirga, ‘Gu nde fhura Fhe Bakɨme nzuav shama mbui shaa, gu nta vuzvugi fhu. Gu vuzvugi, nde tɨvir vhuuin harigi gumgi gu mbigir muuŋgiri.’ Nde maaŋ muuŋv, nde fhura simtɨgar simtɨk ki fhuv gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨnga fhu.
